Robert Moor reported and hosted a podcast about Joe Exotic before the "Tiger King" documentary caught fire. Robert tells Justin about the time he spent at Joe Exoticâ€™s animal park, his honest thoughts about the Netflix documentary, and gives his analysis of why everyone is so fascinated by Joe and Carole.
